listing:
Investor Opportunity: Modern 3-Bed, 2-Bath Home with Strong Cash Flow Potential in Dallas

Located at 18950 Lina St, this updated 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home offers 1,250 square feet of comfortable living space ideally suited for rental investment. Featuring a sleek kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite-inspired countertops, and contemporary cabinetry, the property has been thoughtfully remodeled to appeal to tenants seeking quality and convenience. The open layout maximizes the efficient use of space, providing a solid foundation for steady rental income.

With a purchase price of $125,555, this home presents a competitive entry into the growing Dallas real estate market. The neighborhood’s expanding rental demand, driven by affordability and proximity to key employment hubs, supports strong cash flow and potential appreciation. Estimated after repair value (ARV) and cap rates in this area remain favorable, making this an attractive addition to any investment portfolio.

Key Features:
- 3 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms
- 1,250 Sq. Ft. of Living Space
- Updated Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances
- Durable Flooring Throughout
- Functional Open Layout 

Neighborhood Insight:
Situated in Dallas, TX 75287, this community benefits from ongoing growth and development. Rental demand remains high due to neighborhood amenities and accessibility, attracting a steady stream of renters and ensuring low vacancy rates.

Don’t miss this chance to acquire a turnkey rental property with excellent income potential. Contact us today to schedule a viewing or request additional financial projections tailored for your investing strategy.

Encantadora vivienda moderna en Little Elm, Texas

Descubra esta hermosa residencia de 3 recámaras y 2 baños, perfectamente diseñada para ofrecer confort y funcionalidad en un espacio de 1,250 pies cuadrados. Esta propiedad cuenta con una distribución práctica que maximiza cada área, ideal para familias y profesionales que buscan un ambiente acogedor y contemporáneo. Los acabados son de calidad, proporcionando un hogar agradable y listo para habitar.

La cocina integrada al comedor crea un espacio abierto y luminoso, perfecto para compartir en compañía de familiares y amigos. Las recámaras cuentan con amplios armarios y los baños están equipados con accesorios modernos que complementan el estilo elegante del hogar. La tranquilidad del vecindario y el entorno bien cuidado hacen de esta casa un lugar ideal para establecerse.

Características principales:
- 3 recámaras amplias
- 2 baños completos
- 1,250 pies cuadrados de construcción
- Cocina funcional con espacios abiertos
- Diseño moderno y acabados de calidad

Little Elm se distingue por su ambiente familiar y accesibilidad a servicios, escuelas y parques recreativos. La ubicación ofrece tranquilidad sin sacrificar proximidad a las principales vías de comunicación y zonas comerciales.

No pierda la oportunidad de adquirir esta excelente propiedad a un precio competitivo. Contáctenos hoy mismo para programar una visita y comenzar una nueva etapa en este encantador hogar.

listingText: Welcome home to 3125 Harper St! This charming 3-bedroom, 2-bath gem offers 1,250 sq ft of comfortable living space perfect for your next chapter. Bright and airy, with an open layout that’s great for entertaining or cozy family nights. The kitchen is ready for your culinary adventures, and the bedrooms provide plenty of space to unwind. Outside, enjoy a lovely yard ideal for weekend BBQs or just relaxing with a book. Located in a friendly neighborhood close to shops, parks, and schools, this home has it all. Ready to make it yours? Let’s chat!
